definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: You will be charged commissions and telegraphic fees.
sentences.chinese: 您要付手續費和電報費。

sentences.english: I request for statement by post. HK$20/month will be charged.
sentences.chinese: 本人要求郵寄月結單，每月手續費爲$20。

sentences.english: Please re-issue new card to me & charge all handling fees incurred.
sentences.chinese: 請補發新卡予本人及扣除一切手續費。

sentences.english: In case documents presented with discrepancies, a discrepancy fee of USD 15.00.
sentences.chinese: 若單證不符，一個不符點扣15美元手續費。

sentences.english: How much for the maximum individual inter-bank transfer?
sentences.chinese: 請問個人跨行轉賬最高手續費是多少？

sentences.english: E. The people who hold the card must pay commission charge before period of validity.
sentences.chinese: 持卡者須在有效期前到俱樂部交納相應手續費。

sentences.english: Brush card not to receive poundage.
Please re-issue new card to me and charge all handling fees incurred.
sentences.chinese: 請補發新卡予本人及扣除一切手續費。

sentences.english: The co-payment is usually about five to ten dollars per hospital visit.
sentences.chinese: 每次就醫的定額手續費通常是五到十美元。

sentences.english: Pls state clear below what qty. we have to pay extra handling charge?
sentences.chinese: 請數量明顯低於國度。本人們要付出額外的手續費？

sentences.english: The maximum individual inter-bank transfer fee is 50 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 個人跨行轉賬最高手續費是50元。

sentences.english: If be in, divide except authority is stock compensate poundage bought to be opposite before breath?
sentences.chinese: 假如在除權除息前買股票賠手續費對嗎？

sentences.english: The remitting bank will charge their clients a small fee for this service.
sentences.chinese: 匯款銀行在這項服務上向客戶收取少量的手續費。

sentences.english: How many money does not need poundage below?
sentences.chinese: 多少錢以下不需要手續費？

sentences.english: And we’ve stemmed the increases in naturalization fees.
sentences.chinese: 我們遏止了移民歸化手續費的上漲。

sentences.english: Do not need poundage proof, you also are not taken.
sentences.chinese: 不需要手續費憑證，你也拿不到。

definition: to transfer (money to a bank account)
to disregard/to take no account of
to pay/to hand over (tax payment etc)
